response.original_title: How Saudi Arabia Became One of the Wealthiest Nations on Earth
response.overview: Today, Saudi Arabia is one of the wealthiest nations on earth and a cultural hub for the Muslim world. Vast oil fields have contributed to meteoric development and population growth. However, the Arabian Peninsula was not always home to such wealth. Until the 7th century, the city of Mecca was just another caravan post on the legendary Incense Route. Learn how one family took control of disparate desert tribes, united them through faith, and built the Saudi Arabia we know today.
response.title: How Saudi Arabia Became One of the Wealthiest Nations on Earth
